Description:
SN : 312383137 (PN/20220324/BC1)

All activity to the 1st floor of plot  8, other than to make safe

A person could fall a distance liable to cause serious personal injury.  You have failed to take suitable and sufficient steps to prevent a person falling a distance liable to cause serious injury - e.g. edge protection, scaffold board to prevent a person falling through gaps in the roof/floor
